reference: Anglin, P.M.  and  R.  Gencay (1996) “Semiparametric estimation of a hedonic price function”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 11(6), 633-648.

Description
a cross-section from 1987

observation :  goods
country :  Canada
title: Sales Prices of Houses in the City of Windsor

parameters.recroom: does the house has a recreational room ?
parameters.driveway: does the house has a driveway ?
parameters.airco: does the house has central air conditioning ?
parameters.gashw: does the house uses gas for hot water heating ?
parameters.fullbase: does the house has a full finished basement ?
parameters.lotsize: the lot size of a property in square feet
parameters.prefarea: is the house located in the preferred neighbourhood of the city ?
